node.page:
pagetype: [% my $N = $DB->getNodeById($$NODE{pagetype_nodetype}, 'light'); linkNode $N; %]
parent container: [% return linkNode ($$NODE{parent_container}) if $$NODE{parent_container}; "none"; %]
displaytype: ["$$NODE{displaytype}"]
theme: [% unless ($$NODE{ownedby_theme}) { return "this htmlpage does not belong to a theme"; } my $THEME = getNode $$NODE{ownedby_theme}; linkNode($THEME); %]
mimetype: [% unless ($$NODE{mimetype}) { return "none"; } $$NODE{mimetype}; %]

[{listcode:page}]
[{showsitedoclet}]


[{listpatches}]
node.title: htmlpage display page
